text:
(kids laughing and playing)
(light cheerful music)

♪ When you get that funny
feeling way down low ♪

♪ Just stop what you're
doing and go, go, go ♪
(JJ gasps)
(music continues)
♪ What are you doing? Where did you go? ♪
♪ What are you doing? I want to know ♪

♪ I went to the potty and
washed my hands, too ♪

♪ I went to the potty
like the big kids do ♪
(JJ gasps)
♪ How do I do that? How do I go? ♪
♪ How do I do that? I want to know ♪
♪ Sit on the potty, sit and wait ♪
♪ Sit on the potty, it will be great ♪
(laughing and clapping)
(JJ gasps)
♪ I'm sitting on the potty, ready to go ♪

♪ But nothing is happening
and why, I don't know ♪
♪ Try again later, later today ♪
♪ Try again later, later today ♪
(laughing and clapping)

♪ I've got the funny
feeling way down low ♪

♪ I've got the funny feeling,
I think I have to go ♪
♪ Just sit on the potty, sit and wait ♪
♪ Sit on the potty and it will be great ♪

(JJ grunts)
(music continues)
(kids laughing)
♪ I went to the potty, look and see ♪
♪ I went to the potty, hooray for me ♪
♪ Great job JJ, now wash your hands ♪
♪ Great job JJ, now do the potty dance ♪

♪ When you get that funny
feeling way down low ♪

♪ Just stop what you're
doing and go, go, go ♪
(music continues)
♪ Great job JJ, do the potty dance ♪
♪ We got you some big boy underpants ♪

♪ When you get that funny
feeling way down low ♪
♪ Stop what you're doing and go, go, go ♪
(all laughing)
